testCase.name: error middleware errorHandler responde 500 con shape esperado
error middleware notFoundHandler responde 404 con shape esperado
InMemoryTodoRepository create should create a new todo
InMemoryTodoRepository create should create todo without description
InMemoryTodoRepository findAll should return empty array when no todos exist
InMemoryTodoRepository findAll should return all todos
InMemoryTodoRepository findById should return todo by id
InMemoryTodoRepository findById should return null for non-existent id
InMemoryTodoRepository update should update existing todo
InMemoryTodoRepository update should return null for non-existent todo
InMemoryTodoRepository delete should delete existing todo
InMemoryTodoRepository delete should return false for non-existent todo
TodoService createTodo should create a new todo
TodoService getAllTodos should return all todos
TodoService getTodoById should return todo by id
TodoService getTodoById should return null for non-existent id
TodoService updateTodo should update existing todo
TodoService updateTodo should return null for non-existent todo
TodoService deleteTodo should delete existing todo
TodoService deleteTodo should return false for non-existent todo
TodoService getCompletedTodos should return only completed todos
TodoService getPendingTodos should return only pending todos
Todo controller - errores inesperados (→ 500) GET /api/todos → 500 si el service.getAllTodos lanza
Todo controller - errores inesperados (→ 500) POST /api/todos → 500 si el service.createTodo lanza (no Zod)
Todo controller - errores inesperados (→ 500) PUT /api/todos/:id → 500 si el service.updateTodo lanza (no Zod)
Todo controller - errores inesperados (→ 500) DELETE /api/todos/:id → 500 si el service.deleteTodo lanza
Todo controller - validaciones (Zod → 400) POST /api/todos sin title → 400
Todo controller - validaciones (Zod → 400) PUT /api/todos/:id con payload inválido → 400
Todo API GET /health should return health status
Todo API POST /api/todos should create a new todo
Todo API POST /api/todos should return validation error for invalid data
Todo API GET /api/todos should return all todos
Todo API GET /api/todos/:id should return todo by id
Todo API GET /api/todos/:id should return 404 for non-existent todo
Todo API PUT /api/todos/:id should update existing todo
Todo API PUT /api/todos/:id should return 404 for non-existent todo
Todo API DELETE /api/todos/:id should delete existing todo
Todo API DELETE /api/todos/:id should return 404 for non-existent todo
Todo API GET /api/todos/completed should return only completed todos
Todo API GET /api/todos/pending should return only pending todos
